 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַם‎</span>] **verb** only **Niph\`al** ==be stained== (Late Hebrew Niph\`al ***id.*** ([[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּתֶם‎</span> ***blood-stain***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתִים‎</span> (blood-)***stained*** [[Isa.1.18|Isa 1:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּיתְמָא‎</span> ***blood-stain*** [[Jer.2.22|Jer 2:22]] Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***stain, defile***, Participle, also Pa\`el, Ethpa\`al, and derive.; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***cover, conceal***, so Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***katâmu***</u></abbr>; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כתם‎</span> (?) [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Sendsch. P. 37</sup>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Participle***, figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִכְתָּם עֲוֺנֵךְ לְפָנַי‎</span> [[Jer.2.22|Jer 2:22]] ***stained is thine iniquity before me*** (compare English phrase ***iniquity of deepest dye***).
